name: Diane wilhelm
text: I received excellent service.  When I entered I was greeted by Jason . He stayed with me until I found the recliner in need. I am very happy with my lazy boy chair. They carry a variety and good quality furniture.  Everyone friendly.

name: Denise Launius
text: Beautiful furniture store, great customer service. Great to have them in Cullman!

name: Danielle Hays
text: Beautiful furniture and very helpful associates! Highly recommend!

name: Sharon Delaune
text: We obtained a fairly good deal on a Lazy Boy recliner and didn't have to go out of town to find one my husband liked.

name: Dena Harbison
text: We ordered 2 lazy boy recliners and a Twin mattress set. We are very satisfied with our service and the furniture we ordered came in in a timely manner. Also they deliver and set everything up for u I didn’t have to lift a finger:) I definitely recommend Cullman Furniture Market. Thanks to Alisa and Bea for all their help.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review.  We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again in the future.

name: Joe “THE GREAT JOSSIAH” Thompson
text: They were somewhat high, but they had a nice large selection of lazyboy recliners! B the salesperson was very helpful, polite, and very knowledgeable!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Joe. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.
Thanks,
Cullman Furniture Market

name: William Korwatch
text: The furniture is first class. The salesman was very helpful and the owner was ready to make a sale. Delivered on time.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, William. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.
Thanks,
Cullman Furniture Market

name: Peggy Ambrose
text: Everyone was very nice and very helpful. I purchased a mattress and adjustable bed. Totally satisfied!!  Wish I had bought it sooner. There was no pressure to buy, but someone was there to answer every question.

name: William Korwatch
text: The furniture is first class. The salesman was very helpful and the owner was ready to make a sale. Delivered on time.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, William. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.
Thanks,
Cullman Furniture Market

name: Danice Thomas
text: We went to the wrong place but very helpful on giving us directions to the place we needed to go too. Furniture inside very nice but to much money. The lady was very helpful and kind.

name: Lisa Hulsey
text: Friendly staff and beautiful furniture. The sofa we purchased is extremely comfortable and great quality.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Lisa. We really appreciate your business.

Thanks,

Cullman Furniture Market

name: Stacey Mixon
text: Attentive service without being pushy! Everything was easy to handle, communication was excellent, and delivery was as scheduled and put in place with care by very polite delivery personnel.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Stacey. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.
Cheers,
Cullman Furniture Market

name: Bonnie Bee

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Tolly. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.
Cheers,
Cullman Furniture Market

name: Leanne Carter
text: Very friendly and great selection!

name: Dusten Curvin
text: Very good delivery crew the best

name: Karen Speegle
text: I’m still waiting on my furniture

resp.text: Thank you for the review and sorry for the delay with your furniture order.  Ever since COVID-19 things are just taking longer to get, but I am sure you will love it once it arrives.

name: F Greer
text: Pretty nice place to visit for outdoors furniture, very expensive

name: Reynolds Cheney
text: Well stocked store with high quality furniture. Helpful and friendly staff. Good place to buy from if you are looking to furnish your home.

name: dan sumners
text: Nice and honest folks , we would recommend mark king to anyone looking for home furnishings .

name: Cindy Brooks
text: Very helpful and great quality furniture

name: Ed Saidla
text: Great service and very helpful. Competitive prices and quality name brand furniture. Great selection.

name: Curtis Dawkins
text: Wonderful atmosphere. Top of the line funiture with top of the line customer service. I love this place. Probably the biggest furniture store on the lake

name: Pat Minor
text: Always ready to help you find just what you want!

name: John Battle
text: Friendly atmosphere... Great people to work with..

name: Matt Dinyer
text: Great antique store with lots to look at.

name: The Dragonfly Emporium LLC
text: Great finds!

name: Karen Stamps
text: Great store. Big selection. Clean. Good prices & parking

name: Terry Rickell
text: Has some unique items.  Fun to look around.  Some things reasonably priced other things seem high to me.

name: Princess MeMe
text: Great shop, every thing is displayed to view, price tags were usually visible so no need to wonder and ask. The place is pretty big, I didn't get to look at everything so I will be back.

name: Penny Parker
text: Great store! Wonderful shopping experience with so much to look at. Clean and friendly atmosphere.

name: Debra Gilly
text: Great finds!! Staff is friendly and helpful.

name: Pat Cushing
text: A little pricey

name: Jerry Persons
text: First class !!!!!, New condos will be first class living , facilities as well....don't believe there will be anything comparable in the downtown area...

name: Stephen Moore
text: We used Atchison Home to furnish our new home-- every rug, lamp and piece of furniture. The quality of their furniture is exceptional and by far the best of the numerous places we visited all over the Gulf Coast before buying. The staff are very knowledgeable, friendly and helpful,.They can put together the perfect look for your house--be it that one piece you are missing or an entire house. I can not say enough about how pleased we were we our experience at Atchison. We'll never go anywhere else. ----

name: Matt Zarzour
text: The quality and style of the Atchison Home product offering is in a league of its own.  Their taste and knowledge of European Antiques makes their store my favorite stop along the gulf coast.

name: Durojaiye olusanya Olatunde
text: Quality work.

name: Scott Mains
text: Wonderful selection of rough cut and live edge wood. Definitely worth your time to wander through. Super friendly staff!

name: Pinson Patriot
text: Supper nice and very unique furniture.

name: David McMahon
text: I purchased a beautiful desk from Alabama Sawyer and I love it. It's extraordinarily well-designed and constructed, and I will have it for years. Excellent communication with the company as well. Thanks!

name: Stephen Hicks
text: Innovative design sold me on the Sputnik side table.

name: Kayla Tillman
text: I've been shopping for a couple new mattress sets trying to find the best deal. Went to several places and was about to give up and just break the bank, until I saw Alabama Overstock in Hartselle. Chris Moore, the owner helped me find the right mattress to fit my preferences. The money spent was a fraction of the other stores I went to. They carried the cooling bamboo pillows, cooling mattress protector, and sheet sets. Highly recommend them for your home furnishings and mattress needs!

name: Teri Watson
text: Great mattress store! Go see Chris Moore!

name: Cheri Sellers
text: We LOVE Alabama Overstock!!! They are very friendly and helpful and have great quality furniture and mattresses! We’ve bought a mattress and box springs, a master bedroom suite and bedroom furniture and mattress for our teenage son! Can’t beat their prices  for the quality anywhere!

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we hope you enjoy your bedroom group for years to come.

name: chris pike
text:
Great products, prices and service.
If you need furniture or mattress go by and see them. It will be well worth your time.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Anthony Bradford
text: If you are in need of furniture this is the place to go. Chris and his staff are awesome and very knowledgeable of the products they sale. Easy to work with on purchases.

resp.text: Thank you and we appreciate your business.

name: Demaris Johnson
text: Very nice people to buy from

name: Anna Boger
text: I’ve bought several mattress here always great quality and great service!

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we hope you are still enjoying your mattresses. Call us anytime if we can ever be of service to you.

name: Jessica Johns
text: Totally in love with my pig! The selection of items in this store is amazing and reasonably priced! By far my favorite place to shop now!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I am always on the lookout for anything piggy so look forward to seeing you again to find your piggy a friend!

name: Spencer Shoemaker
text: Amazing ship, well put together and clean, great owner and even better prices. I have never been more impressed with a resale shop.

resp.text: So nice! Thanks for coming by and taking the time to review.  Hope to see you again soon!

name: Catherine Russell
text: I have found so many special things here! Great prices and it’s always a treat to browse, see new treasures, have a cup of coffee, plus you can purchase the best chocolate cake or cupcakes - made by Terri!

resp.text: Thanks so much! The goodies have been scarce lately  because we have been working on our expansion.  Hope to see you again soon including goodies and lots more merchandise!

name: John Keith
text: We loved the place..

name: Larry Daugherty
text: Great little shop in Vincent for decorator items.

resp.text: Thanks so much! Please stop back by whenever you are in the neighborhood!

name: Cody white
text: I’m giving 4 stars all because of Jan that has sold me numerous things for great deals. I would suggest to anyone shopping there to purchase from her because they have a guy salesman that calls you hey buddy that tried to sell me a damaged media center for 5 times what it cost them without the bowling ball hole in the side. So if she’s there it’s great and if not I’d ask when she’s working again and come back.

name: Louis Johnson
text: Hot Buys Furniture is a great place to buy furniture. The sales person is very knowledgeable when it comes to Furniture as well as decorating your home. Very polite and helpful. They will go out of their way to make your buying experience most pleasurable one.

name: Francisco Rueda
text:
I can't put 0 stars because one is the lowest here. but  be aware of this place , they will take your money and if you have any issues they will tell you that the person that sold you that item no longer works there.
but  the store still there?,  this place is a scam

name: Chris Rose
text: PSA: If at any point in time, you want to purchase furniture...avoid Hot Buys Furniture in Decatur, AL. We have been waiting on a sectional that we purchased in full weeks ago. Typically, when a delivery date is changed, the business will contact the customer to notify them. Nope...not these assclowns. The delivery date will come and go and I HAVE TO CALL THEM just to be told the date has been pushed back. This has happened not once, not twice, but three damn times. If we hadn’t paid in full, I would be going somewhere else. Smh.

name: Leopold Hotep Sambou
text: They were very helpful, professional and the delivery guys were excellent.

name: Keisha Cater
text: Will not go here again. Took 3 weeks for them to deliver my furniture and still did not receive it all. Very unorganized and were fed a bunch of lies.

name: Maher Hammami
text: New administration in and looks good.

name: Triciajkkllojljlll Jones
text: Great...customer assistance was awesome

name: DeWayne Heine
text: Name brands at bargain prices.

name: Victoria Keith
text: they match any price!!!

name: Elisabeth Wells
text: Always a delight to shop here. Best, most unique things, hand picked by a woman of excellence taste.

name: Vera Ringold
text: BEAUTIFUL furniture and accent items.

name: Francis Brown
text: Different and unique pieces of furniture and accessories.

name: Monique Martin
text: Great selection for home furniture

name: Theresa Keyes
text: Riff Raff has the best selection and prices in town! They have furniture to fill the house and lots of accessories for those finishing touches. They can even help with gift ideas. Anna is always super helpful with ideas too. Oh and those candles make the house smell wonderful.

resp.text:
Thank you so much!!!
Can’t wait to see you again!

name: jennyferfaithhope
text: Lovely rustic furniture, extremely overpriced

resp.text: Thank you for your kind remarks. We take pride in our high quality furniture. Some of the pieces you took  photos of are actually Mango, not pine which has a higher value. We post photos and prices of all of our fine inventory online and we think they are very competitive. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Benjamin Brewer
text: Stop by there but never bought anything it seems a reasonable place to buy something

resp.text: Thanks for coming in Benjamin! Hope you can return soon!

name: Carey Frasier
text: Love the decor and style..prices inline with others for same items. Will purchase more.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! Look forward to seeing you soon!!

name: Andrea Kilgore
text: Stumbled upon this hidden gem with a friend this past Friday. The store has the most amazing finds...it was so refreshing to find fun, creative pieces that you don’t see in every furniture store you enter. Seriously, there was something for every budget...my friend found some cute, decorative table top decorations and I fell in love with a side table and lamp. The owner was super nice (and NOT pushy!) He let us browse forever, answered our endless questions and then loaded my purchases into my car. Win!! After arriving home, I decided I needed a second table to match my purchase. I messaged the store and they were able to locate its twin within a matter of minutes. Prompt, courteous, small town store with pieces that remind me of Nashville boutiques without their prices?? I will absolutely be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much Andrea! Look forward to seeing you again!

name: Richard Holt
text: Tons of gorgeous rustic furniture

resp.text:
Thanks so much!
Hope to see you soon!

name: Monteia Moore
text: I am so glad I discovered Riff Raff! We are new to Athens and I had been looking for a specific piece of furniture for several weeks. I found a beautiful buffet for our home - just the size and color I had been searching for!  The owner was very helpful and kind. Delivery was quick and professional. I will definitely look forward to stopping by again soon to shop for unique home decor items.

resp.text:
Thank you so much!
Look forward to serving you again!

name: Keyome DT
text: Wow! Love this place! Great stuff and very nice staff

resp.text: Thank you so much!! Can’t wait for you to return!!

name: Kimshara Smith
text: Great selection of furniture! Amazing prices and exceptional quality. The delivery was great and Eli and Joel were great to work with. Visit Riff Raff, you won’t be disappointed!

resp.text:
Thank you so much Kimshara!!
Come back and visit!!

name: Shea
text: I love this store! Prices are great. Furniture is real wood and great quality. I have 4 pieces of furniture from Riff Raff. They are all beautiful and I love them all. I had all my pieces delivered.  I recommend you stop by one of the locations (Athens or Madison) today! You won't be disappointed!

resp.text:
Thanks so much Shea!
Your home looks great!!

name: Bradley Jordan
text: Awesome selection and the prices are very reasonable. Customer service is off the charts. We bought a sofa table and a bedroom set and couldn't be happier with our purchases. Highly recommended!!! If you are looking for farm house or rustic style furniture for the entire house, look no further.

resp.text: Thanks so much Bradley!

name: Chandler M. Jackson
text: If you are looking for great quality furniture at a great price, you’ve got to go see Joel Hamm at Riff Raff. He has some wonderful furniture and decor at both Athens and the new Madison location! They have the best customer service and are always welcoming and happy to help you find exactly what you are looking for. Everyone is knowledgeable and and very friendly. Delivery is timely and professional! I recommend them 100%.

resp.text: Thank you so much Chandler!

name: Melanie Williams
text: Wish I would have found them sooner. Great selection, prices and customer service. Working with Joel was a total pleasure!

resp.text: Thank you so much Melanie!

name: Brandy Whitehead
text: Beautiful furniture, very professional management, and great prices.  I will definitely buy more pieces.  Both the Madison and Athens locations had great unique selections.  Everything was so beautiful, it was hard to pick only a few items.

resp.text: Thanks so much Brandy!! Can’t wait to see you again and hope you enjoy your furniture for years to come!

name: Summer Richter
text: I love Riff Raff! Everything I have bought there is excellent quality. You won’t find better prices either!! I’d highly recommend them to anyone looking to make their home look great.

resp.text: Thanks Summer!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

resp.text: THanks so much Haley! Look forward to seeing you again!!

text: Love love love this place! The prices. The convenient location. The staff is amazing and so helpful. And of course everything they have is so adorable! I want it all!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Come back anytime!

text: Love this store! Riff Raff is my “go-to” for all things furniture! With the help of friendly staff.. I recently purchased another unique piece and absolutely Love it! The quality is great and prices are reasonable. If you haven’t been here, your missing out!

resp.text:
So happy that you’re happy!
Come back soon!

name: Clayton Hamm
text: Love this place

resp.text: Thank you

name: Jeremy C Och
text: Good people GREAT cabinets.

resp.text: Awesome!

name: Emma Liberatore
text: My friend and I have been here twice. Susan is PHENOMENAL. We picked out a bedroom set the first time and she was great from the beginning. We went here today and nobody would help us. We were so happy to see Susan and I made sure to RUN UP to her. She will spend however much time you need and she is beyond helpful. Not only that, she has the kindest soul. We will ALWAYS ask for Susan from now on, and you should to. Don’t give up and just order online- for sure ask for Susan.

name: Betty Anderson
text: The sales person was great. My grand daughter was needing  a bedroom suite. We let her pick what she wanted. We order all the pieces we wanted. The sales lady check each individual piece to make sure it was not discontinue  before ordering. Due to covid we had to wait 3 months to get her set. The day (today) it was delivered , no end table and no chest. They said the chest which would bring all the pieces together has been discontinue. They never got ahold to us to see if we would still want it. My grand daughter is so excited, hate it that we have to tell her after waiting 3 months that it may have to go back. They have another chest that is 4 hours away but they will not send it to us or have some one go pick it up. They said I could go get it. I mean seriously I now have to be your pickup and delivery person, don't think so. Now this set  each piece is a different color and the chest was write with all the different color drawers, which is why I said it was the piece to  bring the set together. It does not even sound like this manager wants to help in making this right except to send an email to corporate. This set should of never been sent with missing pieces, who does business like this, well obviously  Rooms to Go does!!!!!

name: Leslie Burns
text: Rooms to go is the place to shop at for all your furniture needs! 100% Customer service is guaranteed there!. My first time purchasing furniture and the employee  Ray was VERY kind and helpful! He knew exactly what I needed after explaining my choice of colors and options for my living room. Thanks Ray & Rooms to go team!!!

name: Kiarra Lewis
text: I worked with Faith over in the kids/teen section and it was by far the most amazing experience for shopping for my daughters bedroom set. She made sure I had everything I needed and at a good deal. She’s the absolute BEST!! Thanks Faith

resp.text: We're so glad that Faith was able to help you have an amazing experience! Thanks for sharing! -Josh

name: Jerese Carandante
text: We were just in Rooms to Go and had the sweetest most patient lady assist us. To you, Faith, Thank you SO much for your help! You were so super amazing!

name: Andrea Wheeler
text: Sheila was very patient and helped us find what would suit our needs.  Was not pushy or in a hurry to get rid of us.  We spent almost 2 hours there and she was still smiling while we asked about a million questions.  Wish all sales people were like her.  Thank you Sheila.

name: Daphney Donegan
text: Faith, our sales rep was wonderful.  Very friendly and helpful with our purchase.  Greeted from the moment we walked in the door.

name: Cindy Pyle
text: The sales associate, Faith Mingo, was very helpful. She showed us all the different options that were available. She explained the warranty and how delivery of the merchandise worked. Faith went above and beyond assisting us. I would recommend her to anyone to assist with their purchase.

name: Mesha Wright
text: Faith and Darian were amazing and helped us so much!!!! Highly recommend this location and ask for Faith and Darian they will take great care of you!!!

name: Steve Peterson
text: Ambivalent sales people, unapologetic manager, exploitative sales/"swap" policy. The suite promoted for the weekend was not available for review on the sales floor. Not a single piece. Salesperson could not explain this or the return policy so they tagged in a manager. The manager was equally stern regarding the issue, and evasive about the satisfaction policy: 48 hours to decide once delivered sight unseen, with the only option being "swap". When pressed on the issue, the manager shrugged, offered no benefit substitute or apology, and concluded the interaction. No offer to show comparable in-stock models on the sales floor, to attempt to recover from my disappointment, no offer to assist in any way. I felt like my patronage was unwanted and irrelevant. "Take what we have or don't - we don't care - but you're stuck with something once you buy." Not a direct quote, but definitely left with that impact...and unlikely to return.

name: kellibrooke76
text: Excellent experience at Rooms to go Huntsville.Ray was our sales associate & was very helpful & informative about the Beachside Loveseat & Ottoman we bought.

name: Deborah Hopkins
text: I guess God has a sense of humor..I've been saying I was ready for a slower pace of life moving to AL. I never fathomed it would take 4 hours to write up and pay for furniture when I'd already decided what I wanted the night before. Anyway.. they delivered a broken couch and wrong cradenza on 1st delivery. No worries they replaced it. Brought the same wrong cradenza on redelivery though. However they have called every time and stayed in contact with us. They have been polite and professional and have good customer service. Their delivery guys have even been awesome! Super polite guys!! Ericka was great and overall we will return.

name: Wasted720Poet
text: Very friendly and attentive staff, as well as a good selection of items!

name: Charlie Doyle
text: Bought a daybed from Rooms to Go on November 4th, scheduled the delivery for November 12th.  Was a little worried by all of the negative reviews so I kept my expectations low. Surprisingly,the bed was delivered on time and within the first hour of our 4 hour delivery window.  We did opt to put it together ourselves just because we wanted to make sure it was done right.  The bed is perfect and we have no complaints.

name: War Eagle
text: Ordered a tv stand and two  bed frames. All 3 pieces were damaged in some way when they arrived. Wouldn't recommend to anyone.

name: Rick Sellers
text: Lady  working in that section was put out with my young kids

resp.text: Sorry to hear this! Please email the details of your experience to us at TellUs@RoomsToGo.com. -Josh

name: Nicholas Yount
text: I was promised that my purchase would be available to me for pickup on the Wednesday of the week following my purchase.  It was not.  I was again promised that my purchase would be shipped and delivered to my house on the next Thursday, but instead, this store unilaterally decided to schedule my delivery for Saturday--when I'm not available.  I am overwhelmed by the apparent appathy of this store, so, I informed the store that I would like to cancel my order, but they will not refund my money until 2 days after the scheduled delivery date, with an additional processing time of 10 to 15 business days...the purchase amount was just over $700.

name: Monica Jackson
text: Great service and choices.

name: Alissa Bukvic
text: Salesman Ray is awesome!

name: William King
text: Lots of choices.

name: Donte Jackson
text: AWESOME

name: Jorge Horta
text: Customer service was horrible walked the whole store and not a single sales person was available to help me even though they were just socializing
